

snap(0,0,0)

sky(150,255,255)
fog(255,255,255) 
ground(0,150,0)

fadefrom(13865)

name(The Fast & The Furious + The Radical V2)

nlaps(2)

mountains(false)
clouds(false)
polys(false)

soundtrack(rar1,burndo.mod)

set(15,0,0,0)p
set(15,0,5600,0)p
set(15,0,11200,0)
